timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText:
Error occurred during initialization of boot layer
java.lang.module.FindException: Module reactor.netty not found, required by com.sap.cloudfoundry.client.facade
They are required as far as I understood
replies.author: IvanBorislavovDimitrov

timeline.bodyText: Can appArchiveId be retrieved in this method instead of passing it as a parameter?
timeline.author: radito3

timeline.bodyText:
If I understand correctly, this flow means that there isn't a file entry in the MTAR associated with this module because it is described as a docker application, is this right?
If so, how did we operate with docker apps so far?
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText: In v2 the docker apps do not require packages, they are just created as docker image apps and started. In v3 it is required to create a docker package to deploy the application. If there is no module name the application is probably a docker app but I added this check just in case if the user does not provide docker parameters otherwise a null pointer will occur.
replies.author: IvanBorislavovDimitrov

timeline.bodyText: Why isn't the guid in the CloudApplicationExtended object used but a request to the CC is made to fetch the guid?
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText: Because it set in BuildApplicationDeployModelStep and its guid is unknown -> the id is null.
replies.author: IvanBorislavovDimitrov

timeline.bodyText: Maybe dockerStaging would be more descriptive
timeline.author: radito3
